attributes.action: Abdul Sattar Edhi Road in UK
attributes.additional_details: Abdul Sattar Edhi served the humanity across the world and his organization Edhi foundation running world largest Ambulance service network. His name also came in guineas book world record. Simply a case of merit, no one deserves more than Sataar Edhi after whom any road in UK be named. Edhi sahib is a living legend and without doubt has been our undisputed national hero. His services to the humanity are unteachable. He is the most deserving person who served the humanity across the world.
attributes.background: Simply a case of merit, no one deserves more than Abdul Sataar Edhi after whom any road in UK be named. Edhi sahib is a living legend and without doubt has been our undisputed national hero. His services to the humanity are unteachable.

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for naming local roads. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
